tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_traits (
  trait_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trait_name VARCHAR(255),
  dominant_trait BOOLEAN,
  recessive_trait BOOLEAN,
  inheritance_pattern VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Traits (
  trait_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  trait_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  inheritance_pattern VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Offspring (
  offspring_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_trait_id INT NOT NULL,
  inheritance_probability FLOAT NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_parent_trait FOREIGN KEY (parent_trait_id) REFERENCES Traits(trait_id)
)

CREATE TABLE OffspringTraits (
  offspring_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent1_trait_id INT,
  parent2_trait_id INT,
  inherited_trait_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (parent1_trait_id) REFERENCES GeneticTraits(trait_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (parent2_trait_id) REFERENCES GeneticTraits(trait_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (inherited_trait_id) REFERENCES GeneticTraits(trait_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TraitInheritance (
  inheritance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  parent_trait_id INT,
  child_trait_id INT,
  inheritance_pattern VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (parent_trait_id) REFERENCES GeneticTraits(trait_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (child_trait_id) REFERENCES GeneticTraits(trait_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inheritance (
    inheritance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT NOT NULL,
    trait_id INT NOT NULL,
    individual_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trait_id) REFERENCES Traits(trait_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (individual_id) REFERENCES Individuals(individual_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trait_inheritance (
  inheritance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trait_id INT,
  pattern_id INT,
  family_id INT,
  individual_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (trait_id) REFERENCES genetic_traits(trait_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pattern_id) REFERENCES inheritance_patterns(pattern_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (family_id) REFERENCES families(family_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (individual_id) REFERENCES individuals(individual_id)
);
